name: Table Top Racing: Swag Bag
description:
This amazing value bundle puts all the Table Top Racing: World Tour content so far into one handy 'Swag Bag”.
Included: Full Game, Supercharger Pack, Tropical Ice Pack, 3D Animated PS4 Theme and all 16 Premium Avatars.
Typically over 30 hours of single game play and much more if you get online for 8 player battle.

Table Top Racing: World Tour:
8 Player PvP multiplayer combat racing
5 Unique Locations
20 Table Top circuits
12 Super-cool miniature cars
8 Cunning 'Power-Up Weapons'
6 Unique and Powerful “Weapon Wheels”
6 Full multi-event Championships
26 Rule-bending Special Events
6 Unique game play modes
25+ Track exclusive soundtrack by Juice Recordings, San Diego.

Supercharger Pack:
1 'Can Ya Dig It' Desert Explorer Location
4 New Circuits
4 Iconic Cool Cars
3 New Championships
16 Special Events

Tropical Ice Pack:
2 New Game Play Modes
2 New Locations
8 New Circuits
3 New Championships
16 Special Events.

PLUS
Our incredible 3D Animated Theme and all 16 Premium Car Avatars

Compatible with PS4 Only

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.
